metadata.dcterms:title: Temporal niche differentiation among large herbivores in the Mayanja River, Uganda
metadata.dcterms:creator: Chui, Jocelyn
Warbington, Camille
Boyce, Mark
metadata.dcterms:description: Camera trap data from three years (2015, 2016, 2017) for seven herbivore species (bushbuck, waterbuck, bush pig, baboon, warthog, cattle, and hippopotamus) using a forested area in central Uganda.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
